form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: IMPORTANT: AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THIS NOTICE YOU ARE REQUIRED TO MAKE ARRANGEMENTSS IMMEDIATELY FOR YOUR MEDICAL EXAMINATION WITH THE HOSPITAL NAMED BELOW

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 IMPORTANT: AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THIS NOTICE YOU ARE REQUIRED TO MAKE ARRANGEMENTS IMMEDIATELY FOR YOUR MEDICAL EXAMINATION WITH THE HOSPITAL NAMED BELOW You are instructed to arrange for an appointment with the following hospital where the required laboratory and X-ray procedures as well as the medical examination can be performed. If you prefer you may make arrangements to have the required X-ray (14" x 17") with interpretation and the serologic test for syphilis performed by a licensed physician of your own choice. However, the medical examination itself must be performed at the hospital named below. The X-ray and serology report must not be over 90 days old. The total cost of this examination will not be more than $30.00. If you appear at the hospital named below with X-ray, interpretation of X-ray and serology report the cost of the medical examination will not be more than $10.00. The amount which applies in your case is required to be paid by you at the time of your examination. The results of the medical examination must be presented at your immigration inter- view as scheduled. 14 X-RAY REPORT IS NOT NECESSARY FOR CHILD YEARS OF AGE OR UNDER. SEROLOGY TEST IS NOT NECESSARY FOR CHILD YEARS OF AGE OR UNDER. IDENTIFICATION WILL BE REQUIRED. 14 ARRANGEMENTS FOR YOUR MEDICAL EXAMINATION MUST BE MADE BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 8:00 A.M. AND 3:00 P.M., AT: WALTHER MEMORIAL HOSPITAL 1116 NORTH KEDZIE AVENUE CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60651 TELEPHONE NUMBER 312-227-3100, EXT. 242
